doc.author: lihongbo
doc.description: 投公司统计工单处理信息

sql.name: hbeoms.companydeal
sql.item: select b.company as 公司名称, nvl(a.acceptcount,0) as 本月处理环节数, b.overtime as 处理环节超时个数 from (select g.C630000018 as company, count(t.C1) as acceptcount from {300} t,{200} g,{100} u where t.C700020019=0 and t.C700020011='已完成' and t.C700020010=u.C630000001 --and u.C630000013=g.C1 and (u.C630000013=g.C1 or u.C630000015=g.C1) and g.c630000020='000000000600001' {1} {5} group by g.C630000018) a, ( select d.company, nvl(c.overtime,0) as overtime from (select g.C630000018 as company, count(t.C1) as overtime from {300} t,{200} g,{100} u where t.C700020019=0 and t.C700020011='已完成' and t.C700020010=u.C630000001 --and u.C630000013=g.C1 and (u.C630000013=g.C1 or u.C630000015=g.C1) and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and t.C700020017>t.C700020014 and t.C700020017>0 and t.C700020014>0 {1} {5} group by g.C630000018) c, (select g.C630000018 as company from {200} g where g.c630000020='000000000600001' {1}) d where c.company(+)=d.company) b where a.company(+)=b.company
